overview: Inspired by an atmosphere of clouds, dunes and lagoons, CLOUD TRYPTIC explores the natural elements that compose the conceptual imagery of CARLA PONTESâ€™ ss17 collection.  Conceived and interpreted as a whole, CLOUD TRYPTIC is divided into three distinct moments that touch and cross each other, becoming one single entity. Presented step-by-step, we can only find all the visual and sound layers once we see them side by side, overlapping aligned and misaligned horizons.
title: Cloud Tryptic
